Desc.entry: An umbrella group for Somali organisations in Sheffield. Provides cultural and social functions. Runs lunch clubs, sewing classes and ESOL training programmes with Internet access and IT literacy. Provides advice and advocacy services. Runs a youth club and provides a homework club for school children and translation and interpreting service. Also runs a parent mentoring project in collaboration with the University of Sheffield. Celebrates Somali Independence Day in June. Company limited by guarantee no 6679347.
